definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: Since 2003, the Tourism-based Country Strategy has been established and implemented in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 自2003年以來，日本確立並實施了觀光立國戰略。

sentences.english: Dalian Medical University campus is located in the new South Waterfront Lushun the middle of tourist belt.
sentences.chinese: 大連醫科大學新校園位於旅順南路海濱觀光帶的中段。

sentences.english: Pleases allow me to arrange a tour for you. We can go together.
sentences.chinese: 請允許我爲你安排一次觀光，我可以陪你。

sentences.english: Older women already predominate on organized sightseeing tours.
sentences.chinese: 年長的女性在各種觀光旅遊團中已佔大多數。

sentences.english: My sister likes to go sight-seeing in a pleasure boat around the West Lake.
sentences.chinese: 妹妹喜歡坐遊舫繞着西湖觀光遊玩。

sentences.english: An employee of Taiwan's Tourist Bureau.
Experience the best of Canberra on this full day Hop-On Hop-Off sightseeing Discovery tour of the Australian capital city.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐堪培拉城市觀光遊覽車去遊覽澳大利亞的首都。

sentences.english: Only those pre-booked on Malacca excursions may disembark.
sentences.chinese: 惟有已預定馬六甲上岸觀光活動的乘客方可下船。

sentences.english: His heart desired this, so he decided to go to Shewei country and learn Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 他心中十分嚮往，便想去舍衛國觀光並修學佛法。

sentences.english: Residents also complain that Argentina hasn't given nature-based tourism a chance."If
sentences.chinese: 當地居民也抱怨阿根廷政府不肯給自然觀光業機會。

sentences.english: Jiang is planning a trip to Chinatown with Lance.
sentences.chinese: 蔣和蘭斯計劃去唐人街觀光。

sentences.english: Curious sightseers rolled up in their hundreds.
sentences.chinese: 數以百計的好奇的觀光客都湧到那兒。

sentences.english: Making you feel it as a sight-seeing flying.
Do you have any bus-tour service at this hotel?
sentences.chinese: 你們旅館有安排觀光旅遊的服務嗎？

sentences.english: I came on business before, but this time I'm here to sightsee .
sentences.chinese: 我以前是來出差的，但是這一次是來觀光的。

sentences.english: But it has already become a must-see site for tourists when they arrive in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 但多年來早已成爲觀光客到巴塞隆納必經之地。

definition: site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan
conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
